document_data.name: Walking Tree
document_data.mainbody: like [[treant]]s, walking trees were entirely non-intelligent, and only obeyed the will of their masters.
document_data.Description: Unlike [[treant]]s, walking trees were entirely non-intelligent, and only obeyed the will of their masters.
document_data.Combat: The attacks of walking trees were highly damaging, but they were very slow. These creatures were immune to becoming confused and were naturally well armored.
document_data.History: In the 14{{th}} century [[DR]], the [[Cult of Moander]] joined forces with [[Tanetal]] and and the mage, [[Marcus (mage)|Marcus]]. With the powers of [[Moander]], they were able to animate walking trees, and the power was given to many trees of the [[Elven Court]].
